main event: A 15-year-old and her younger sister observed a UFO in the sky on June 3, 1967.
interesting points: The UFO was a faintly bright, consistent white light with occasional flashings of red.,The object moved consistently across the sky, blinking out and reappearing.,The sighting lasted approximately 20 seconds.,The UFO disappeared as if a light was being turned off.,Four automobiles reportedly flew in the same direction shortly after the UFO vanished.
sighted object: a bright white light with red flashes
